thread.title: Denver's SkyLaw Release "Wait For Me" Music Video
thread.title_full: Denver's SkyLaw Release "Wait For Me" Music Video - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Denver's SkyLaw Release "Wait For Me" Music Video
text:
Electro-pop band SkyLaw return with third single from forthcoming Evolution EP
 LOS ANGELES, CA, October 16, Following the recent release of their indie rock-inspired single "Indigo" the electro-pop Denver band known as SkyLaw is back with yet another audience pleaser. The new record "Wait For Me" is a great cross-genre single that spotlights the band's innovative sound. Produced by Toy Box, the "Wait For Me" music video was directed by Chris Simmons and now available on Youtube at http://buff.ly/1jqMKD0 The track is slated to be released on iTunes this fall.
This dynamic group of four very talented musicians are currently defying the odds with their eclectic musical fusions. Influenced by a variety of genres including rock, hip hop, electro and pop music, the band has cultivated an increasing large fan following. Led by married lead vocalists Layne and Reve Kalell, SkyLaw's line up also consists of Nema Sobhani (Guitar) and Erik Martin (Drums, Piano). Self-sufficient and eager to make some noise, you can feel their genuine energy in each song.
A recent review of their Indigo single from Jamsphere Magazine boasts, "SkyLaw take you on a heart-pumping, foot-tapping, finger-snapping, unbelievable, beyond amazing, magical musical adventure. Their never-ending excitement choruses, their quick-flow rap verses and their all-embracing music production, are all packed into this new track."
Now, with the release of "Wait For Me" the band is making their presence known. First, with the growing buzz in their home state and even throughout the west coast as they prep for the October 29th release of their debut "Evolution" EP. For more information on SkyLaw visit their official Facebook page at www.Facebook.com/SkyLawEVO
About SkyLaw
Fueled by the passion of four talented musicians, SkyLaw represents a wide variety of genres. With a foundation of lyrical hip-hop and electro-pop, the band comes together to deliver an unforgettable experience of sound. With a mission to take the best elements of every style of music to form a fusion of universally appealing messages, their goal is to uplift and inspire. Through activism and community outreach, SkyLaw strives to make a positive change in the world. As they prep for the release of their first EP project, a "Light-Up" fashion line and several SkyLaw-themed events, the band welcomes you into their Evolution.
Twitter: @SkyLawEvo
